Description: One unified business management suite, encompassing ERP/Financials, CRM and ecommerce.
Name: Oracle NetSuite

Methods.Name: List Subsidiaries
Methods.Description: Retrieves all subsidiaries.

Methods.Name: List Subsidiary Table Custom Fields
Methods.Description: Retrieves the properties of custom fields in the subsidiary table.

Methods.Name: List Transactions By Condition
Methods.Description: Retrieves all transactions that meet the specified condition.

Methods.Name: List Updated Transactions
Methods.Description: Retrieves transactions updated since the last time this action was executed.

Methods.Name: Get Transaction
Methods.Description: Retrieves the specified transaction.

Methods.Name: List New Transactions
Methods.Description: Retrieves transactions created since the last time this action was executed.

Methods.Name: List Transactions
Methods.Description: Retrieves all transactions.

Methods.Name: List Subscription Table Custom Fields
Methods.Description: Retrieves the properties of custom fields in the subscription table.

Methods.Name: List Subscription Types
Methods.Description: Retrieves all campaign subscriptions available in your NetSuite account.

Methods.Name: List Accounts
Methods.Description: Retrieves all accounts.

Methods.Name: Get Contact By Email
Methods.Description: Retrieves the specified contact by email.

Methods.Name: List New Contacts
Methods.Description: Retrieves contacts created since the last time this action was executed.

Methods.Name: List Updated Contacts
Methods.Description: Retrieves contacts updated since the last time this action was executed.

Methods.Name: List Contact Table Custom Fields
Methods.Description: Retrieves the properties of custom fields in the contact table.

Methods.Name: Get Contact By ID
Methods.Description: Retrieves the specified contact by ID.

Methods.Name: List Contacts
Methods.Description: Retrieves all contacts.

Methods.Name: List Updated Vendors
Methods.Description: Retrieves vendors updated since the last time this action was executed.

Methods.Name: List Vendor Categories
Methods.Description: Retrieves all vendor categories.

Methods.Name: List New Vendors
Methods.Description: Retrieves vendors created since the last time this action was executed.

Methods.Name: List Vendors
Methods.Description: Retrieves all vendors.

Methods.Name: Get Employee By ID
Methods.Description: Retrieves the specified employee by ID.

Methods.Name: List Employees
Methods.Description: Retrieves all employees.

Methods.Name: Search Employees
Methods.Description: Retrieves employees whose Last Name matches or partially matches the search term.

Methods.Name: List Terms
Methods.Description: Retrieves all transaction terms.

Methods.Name: List Customer Statuses
Methods.Description: Retrieves all available status definitions for entity's of type Customer.

Methods.Name: List Job Statuses
Methods.Description: Retrieves all available status definitions for entity's of type Job.

Methods.Name: List Lead Statuses
Methods.Description: Retrieves all available status definitions for entity's of type Lead.

Methods.Name: List Prospect Statuses
Methods.Description: Retrieves all available status definitions for entity's of type Prospect.

Methods.Name: List Customers
Methods.Description: Retrieves all customers.

Methods.Name: List Customer's Campaigns
Methods.Description: Retrieves all campaigns for the specified customer.

Methods.Name: List Customer's Subscriptions
Methods.Description: Retrieves all subscriptions for the specified customer.

Methods.Name: Update Customer
Methods.Description: Updates the specified customer.

Methods.Name: List Customers By Campaign
Methods.Description: Retrieves all customers for the specified campaign.

Methods.Name: List Updated Customers
Methods.Description: Retrieves customers updated since the last time this action was executed.

Methods.Name: Create Customer
Methods.Description: Creates a new customer.

Methods.Name: Get Customer By ID
Methods.Description: Retrieves the specified customer by ID.

Methods.Name: Search Customers
Methods.Description: Retrieves customers whose Company Name or Alt Name matches or partially matches the search term.

Methods.Name: List New Customers
Methods.Description: Retrieves customers created since the last time this action was executed.

Methods.Name: Get Customer By Email
Methods.Description: Retrieves the specified customer by email.

Methods.Name: Get Customer
Methods.Description: Retrieves the customer specified by ID.

Methods.Name: List New Customers
Methods.Description: Retrieves the ID of customers created since the last run. Please note: as it pertains to dates, this endpoint only supports date filtering (eg. 01/01/2022), not date-time filtering (eg. 2022-01-01T12:00:00Z).

Methods.Name: List Updated Customers
Methods.Description: Retrieves the ID of customers updated since the last run. Please note: as it pertains to dates, this endpoint only supports date filtering (eg. 01/01/2022), not date-time filtering (eg. 2022-01-01T12:00:00Z).

Methods.Name: List Customers
Methods.Description: Retrieves the ID of all customers.

Methods.Name: List Currencies
Methods.Description: Retrieves all currencies.

Methods.Name: List New Partners
Methods.Description: Retrieves partners created since the last time this action was executed.

Methods.Name: Get Partner By ID
Methods.Description: Retrieves the specified partner by ID.

Methods.Name: List Partners
Methods.Description: Retrieves all partners.

Methods.Name: Get Partner By Email
Methods.Description: Retrieves the specified partner by email.

Methods.Name: List Updated Partners
Methods.Description: Retrieves partners updated since the last time this action was executed.

Methods.Name: List Inventory Items
Methods.Description: Retrieves all items from your inventory.
